tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MedicalInventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE HealthcareFacility (
 facility_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 facility_name STRING,
 facility_location STRING,
 total_items INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE InventoryItem (
 item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 item_name STRING,
 quantity INTEGER,
 facility_id UUID REFERENCES HealthcareFacility(facility_id)
)

CREATE TABLE MedicalEquipment (
 equipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 equipment_name STRING,
 availability BOOLEAN,
 facility_id UUID REFERENCES HealthcareFacility(facility_id)
)

CREATE TABLE MedicalSupplies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Equipment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Facilities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    address VARCHAR(200),
    director VARCHAR(50),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE facility_inventory (
    facility_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (facility_id, item_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES medical_facilities(facility_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES inventory_items(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions(
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    order_id INT NOT NULL,
    facility_id INT NOT NULL,
    status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    delivery_date DATE NOT NULL
);
